name: RoboMatch
description: The game type three in a row with robots, galaxies and stores. The player armed robots. Rearrange chips that the player shoots at the enemy. After the turn of a player - the progress of the enemy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Pentium or AMD Dual-Core 2.4+ Ggh Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Pentium or AMD Quad-Core 3.0+ Ggh Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
